results.title: Effect of Ezetimibe combined with Simvastatin in the treatment of coronary heart disease: a retrospective analysis.
results.text_hl: During the treatment, the incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@MACE@@@ in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@Simvastatin+Ezetimibe@@@ group (3.85%) was significantly lower than that in the @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ group (16.33%) (p<0.05).

results.title: Ezetimibe/simvastatin (INEGY) in the treatment of hyperlipidaemia.
results.text_hl: This article will review clinical experience to date with @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@ezetimibe/simvastatin@@@, commenting upon its place and potential value in the prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular disease@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin-ezetimibe combination therapy is associated with a lower rate of major adverse cardiac events in type 2 diabetics than high potency statins alone: A population-based dynamic cohort study.
results.text_hl: The potential benefits of @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin-ezetimibe@@@ for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ at a lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@MACE@@@ are unclear.

results.title: Clinical outcome of statin plus ezetimibe versus high-intensity statin therapy in patients with acute myocardial infarction propensity-score matching analysis.
authors: other Korea Acute Myocardial Infarction Registry Investigators
results.text_hl: After propensity matching analysis, @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin-ezetimibe@@@ was associated with a higher incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@MACE@@@ than high-intensity statin therapy (adjusted hazard ratio: 3.090, 95% confidence interval: 1.715 to 5.566, p<0.001).

results.title: A comparison of efficacy and safety of an ezetimibe/simvastatin combination compared with other intensified lipid-lowering treatment strategies in diabetic patients with symptomatic cardiovascular disease.
results.text_hl: The low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C) lowering efficacy of switching to @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@/@CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@EZ/S@@@) 10/20 mg versus doubling the run-in statin dose (to @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg or @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ 20 mg) or switching to @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ 10 mg in subjects with @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CVD@@@) and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ was assessed.

results.title: At sea with SEAS: the first clinical endpoint trial for ezetimibe, treatment of patients with mild to moderate aortic stenosis, ends with mixed results and more controversy.
results.text_hl: Compared with placebo, @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CVD@@@ events were reduced by 4.4% from 20.1% to 15.7% in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@ group (p=0.02).

citations.NLM: Hamilton-Craig I, Kostner K, Colquhoun D, Woodhouse S. At sea with SEAS: the first clinical endpoint trial for ezetimibe, treatment of patients with mild to moderate aortic stenosis, ends with mixed results and more controversy. Heart Lung Circ. 2009 Oct;18(5):343-6. PMID: 19586799

results.title: Intensive lipid lowering with simvastatin and ezetimibe in aortic stenosis.
results.text_hl: Fewer @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@ischemic cardiovascular@@@ events in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin-ezetimibe@@@ group (148 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@) than in the placebo group (187 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@) (hazard ratio, 0.78; 95% CI, 0.63 to 0.97; P=0.02), mainly because of the smaller number of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who underwent coronary-artery bypass grafting.
